summary.span: 提供 和 類別成員的通用實作。

span.span: Provides a common implementation of members for the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供的共用項目的實作和控制項。The class provides implementations of common elements for the and controls. 下列屬性是資料繫結的使用者的主要考量或是: ， ， ，和屬性。The following properties are of primary concern to users of a data-bound or : , , , and properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是完整的應用程式，示範如何使用， ， ，以及的成員類別，如藉由將類別。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 此範例會載入和清單方塊。The example loads an and the list box. 當使用者選取項目在清單方塊中時，選取的值用來傳回所選的項目相關聯的資料。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有兩種方式來填滿和控制項。There are two ways to fill the and controls. 比方說，您可以在其中加入物件至使用方法。For example, you can add objects to the by using the method. 您也可以加入至物件利用， ，和屬性以填滿。You can also add objects to a by using the , , and properties to fill the . 當屬性設定，否則使用者無法修改項目集合。When the property is set, a user cannot modify the items collection. 如果設定屬性可讓資料來源，若要變更，就會引發事件。If setting the property causes the data source to change, the event is raised. 如果設定這個屬性會導致資料成員，若要變更，就會引發事件。If setting this property causes the data member to change, the event is raised. 當您設定要`null`，設為空字串 ("")。When you set to `null`, is set to an empty string (""). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是完整的應用程式，示範如何使用， ， ，以及的成員類別，如藉由將類別。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 此範例會載入和清單方塊。The example loads an and the list box. 當使用者選取項目在清單方塊中時，選取的值用來傳回所選的項目相關聯的資料。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ListControl1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#142](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#142)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#142](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#142)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承自控制項可以顯示不同類型的物件。The controls that inherit from can display diverse types of objects. 如果指定的屬性不存在物件或值為空字串 ("")，物件的結果`ToString`方法會改為顯示。If the specified property does not exist on the object or the value of is an empty string (""), the results of the object's `ToString` method are displayed instead. 如果無法設定新的顯示成員，會維護先前設定的顯示成員。If the new display member cannot be set, the previous display member setting is maintained. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是完整的應用程式，示範如何使用， ， ，以及的成員類別，如藉由將類別。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 此範例會載入和清單方塊。The example loads an and the list box. 當使用者選取項目在清單方塊中時，選取的值用來傳回所選的項目相關聯的資料。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個可見的項目之前引發事件格式化。The event is raised before each visible item in the is formatted. 處理此事件可讓您存取要顯示此清單項目中，透過字串屬性。Handling this event gives you access to the string to be displayed for this list item, through the property of the . 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ListControl1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#144](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#144)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#144](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#144)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，以`true`會導致事件引發的每個可見成員。Setting the property to `true` causes the event to be raised for each visible member of the . ，和相關，如下所示：, , and are related as follows: - 如果已`false`，將不會設定為-1是空白。If is `false`, will not be set to -1 when is blank. - 如果已`true`，會設定為-1是空白。If is `true`, will be set to -1 when is blank.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在未指定的屬性，傳回的結果`ToString`物件的方法。If a property is not specified in , returns the results of the `ToString` method of the object. ，和相關，如下所示：, , and are related as follows: - 如果已`false`，將不會設定為-1是空白。If is `false`, will not be set to -1 when is blank. - 如果已`true`，會設定為-1是空白。If is `true`, will be set to -1 when is blank. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例所示傳回所指定的屬性值屬性。The following code example shows the returning the value of the property specified by the property. 此程式碼是摘錄自範例所示類別概觀。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 請參閱針對整個程式碼清單。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是完整的應用程式，示範如何使用， ， ，以及的成員類別，如藉由將類別。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 此範例會載入和清單方塊。The example loads an and the list box. 此範例也會使用填寫文字方塊中，當使用者選取項目在清單方塊中的事件。The example also uses the event to fill in a text box when the user selects an item in the list box. 文字方塊會填入與選取的項目相關聯的資料。The text box is filled with the data associated with the selected item. [!code-cpp[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要當做 中項目之實際值使用的屬性路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the property to use as the actual value for the items in the .

value.span: ，表示 屬性值的單一屬性名稱，或者表示解析為最終資料繫結物件屬性名稱的句號分隔屬性名稱階層架構。

span.span: A representing a single property name of the property value, or a hierarchy of period-delimited property names that resolves to a property name of the final data-bound object.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的內容在您資料繫結的情況下的屬性。Specify the contents of the property in cases where you bind data. 您可以清除屬性的屬性設定為空字串 ("") 或`null`。You can clear the property by setting the property to an empty string ("") or `null`. 設定新屬性會引發和事件。Setting a new property raises the and events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示將資料載入並設定清單中物件的屬性。The following code example shows loading the data into an and setting the to a property of the object in the list. [!code-cpp[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的屬性路徑無法透過 屬性所指定的物件獲得解析。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ListControl1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#148](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#148)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#148](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#148)]
